thread.title: NFL keen to see who watches Yahoo game webcast and how
thread.title_full: NFL keen to see who watches Yahoo game webcast and how

title: NFL keen to see who watches Yahoo game webcast and how
text:
NFL keen to see who watches Yahoo game webcast and how 
Reuters Friday 23rd October, 2015 
The U.S. National Football League will be closely watching the audience for Yahoo Inc's global webcast of a game on Sunday as it considers whether to do more deals to live stream games, an NFL official told Reuters Thursday....
